extendedInfo.description: Download the Church Bell Soundboard and wake up to inspiring hymns and play bells for your friend's wedding. The beautiful music and quality bell ringing of the popular Chime Master electronic church bell carillon is now available for play on your mobile device. Set bells and music for ringtones, alarms and notifications or play them at the push of a menu button.* Amazing Grace* A Mighty Fortress * In the Garden* Lourdes Chime* Big Swinging Bell* Big Tolling Bell* Four Bell Wedding PealTap any blue button to ring a church bell or play a hymn. Tap and hold any blue button for the ringtone menu. Tap the red Stop button to interrupt playback.During playback, the device's volume buttons control the media file playback level. When a church bell sound is not being played, the controls revert to the device ringer level.This free version displays promotional information about Chime Master's church bell ringing products with easy links to our website product pages.
